insert into fr_role (node_no, `name`, description, is_initial, create_user, create_user_name, create_date, update_user, update_user_name, update_date, remark) values (#{nodeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isInitial,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update fr_role set node_no = #{nodeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_initial = #{isInitial,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_user_name = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_user_name = #{updateUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, node_no, `name`, description, is_initial, create_user, create_user_name, create_date, update_user, update_user_name, update_date, remark from fr_role where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
